DOC.brief_summary: This study represent first randomize trial compare traditional inpatient induction transcervical foley catheter versus outpatient induction immediate removal transcervical foley catheter . The immediate removal technique allow induction process begin hospital setting , allow patient go home without foreign body situ . The investigator hypothesize outpatient group spend less time hospitalize prior discharge . Additionally , investigator explore vaginal delivery rate maternal/neonatal safety profile group .
DOC.brief_title: Outpatient Labor Induction With Transcervical Foley Balloon
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled trial . Patients candidate labor induction meet inclusion criterion identify obstetrics clinic schedule induction labor , later clinic date . If agree participate , patient randomize enrol study time . Those consent randomize Group A ( Experimental Group ) Group B ( Control Group ) . No stratification criterion use . Patients randomize control group undergo induction labor use standard foley bulb Pitocin method . Participants place dorsal lithotomy position , 18 French Foley catheter place transcervically balloon fill 60mL sterile saline . One two method use place transcervical foley base provider preference determination method offer great chance successful placement . Method A placement foley `` blindly '' palpation cervix . Method B utilize direct visualization sterile speculum placement . Method document data collection form . The catheter leave place IV oxytocin start per protocol . The foley catheter remove 12 hour spontaneously extrude . Patients randomized experimental group undergo outpatient induction labor . Either two describe method used place 18 French Foley catheter transcervically balloon fill 60mL sterile saline . The catheter deflate remove within 10 minute placement . The patient undergo non-stress test ( NST ) . If patient reactive NST late variable deceleration uterine tachysystole , patient discharge home clear return precaution instruction return triage area 24 hour . When patient return hospital , sterile vaginal exam do Bishop score document . The patient admit L & D inpatient continuation induction IV oxytocin per protocol . In accordance Friedman curve current LAC+USC practice , primigravid participant give 20 hour maximum Pitocin ( 22 mU/ min ) achieve active labor multigravid participant give 14 hour fail induction diagnose . Cesarean delivery recommend arrest dilation , arrest descent , obstetric indication decide on-duty house staff . Finally , patient request , intravenous regional anesthesia make available time labor delivery process .
DOC.criteria: Viable Intrauterine Pregnancy Greater equal 37 week gestation date induction Cephalic Presentation Medically indicate induction labor AFI great equal 5 Patient able contact phone demonstrates understand return instruction Cervical Dilation 2cm less Placenta Previa/Low Lying Placenta Placenta accreta/increta/percreta Undiagnosed vaginal bleeding Preeclampsia HELLP Syndrome Intrauterine Growth Restriction Rupture Membranes Prior cesarean section transfundal uterine surgery Twin Gestation Fetal Anomaly Rh Isoimmunization Fetal Demise Uterine Tachysystole Less 18 year age HIV Infection Active herpes , hepatitis B C infection Latex Allergy EFW > 4000g Chorioamnionitis NonEnglish NonSpanish Speaking
